channel.title: Hth on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Hth on purpleidea.com

item.title: sorting out the confusion
item.description: if i’ve been silent as of late, it’s because i’ve been furiously coding away. i’ve got what i think are some elegant implementations cooking, and with any luck my extra work will pay off in hours and days and months of time saved down the road. i’ve got a few interesting (interesting with respect to your average rating of the blog posts on this site) posts cooking in my mind, and hopefully they’ll appear shortly!
